column2: I put my name down for our party of 7 and was told the estimated wait time was an hour and a half (pretty accurate). We were able to pre-order our pizza
column3: so when we were seated it came out pretty quickly. During our wait
column4: we kept track of our place in line via a website that was sent to my phone
column5: which let us wander while waiting. For the 7 of us
column6: we ordered two medium pizzas (one Classic and one Lou).
